Title: Revenge of the Green Dragons
Writer: Michael Di Jiacomo (screenplay by), Andrew Loo (screenplay by), Fredric Dannen (based on the article by)
Actors: Justin Chon, Kevin Wu, Harry Shum Jr., Eugenia Yuan
Plot: REVENGE OF THE GREEN DRAGONS follows two immigrant brothers Sonny (Justin Chon) and Steven (Kevin Wu) who survive the impoverished despair of New York in the 1980s by joining Chinatown gang "The Green Dragons". The brothers quickly rise up the ranks, drawing the unwanted attention of hard-boiled city cops. After an ill- fated love affair pits Sonny against his own brother, he sets out for revenge on the very gang who made him who he is.
